@Christina Vasilakopoulou wrote:

Dear all,

We would like to invite applications for a postdoctoral position in the School of Mathematical and Physical Sciences, at the National Technical University of Athens (NTUA). The project's title is "Enriched structures of operads and modules: the Grothendieck construction and systems modeling", funded by the Hellenic Foundation for Research and Innovation (HFRI). The position's duration is for one year, with a possibility to renew for two more years.

In order to apply, please send in a CV (4 pages maximum) including the information of 3 possible referees, as well as a motivation letter (1 page maximum).The deadline is 17th of May. The starting date is 17th of July 2025, however there is some flexibility according to the successful candidate's availability.

For any informal inquiries, feel free to contact me.

All the best,

Christina Vasilakopoulou

http://www.math.ntua.gr/~cvasilak/
